sentences.en: But, industrial organization makes clear theoretically, these camp also are not impassable.
sentences.cn: 但是, 产业组织理论表明, 这些壁垒也并非不可逾越.

sentences.en: Many streams have flooded their banks, making some roads impassable.
sentences.cn: 许多小河的水已经漫过堤岸，造成一些道路不能通行。

sentences.en: Snow and ice made the road impassable.
The Alps mountains , lofty and rugged, stood like an impassable wall before him.
sentences.cn: 巍峨崎岖的阿尔卑斯山, 象一座无法越过的高墙屹立在他面前.

sentences.en: The avenue had never been paved, and deep mud made it impassable in winter.
sentences.cn: 这条大街从未铺过路面，冬天泥泞不堪，无法通行。

sentences.en: The driver couldn't see either. Besides, the roads are nearly impassable.
sentences.cn: 刚才司机也看不清楚. 而且这些路简直无法通行.

sentences.en: The explorers were confronted with gorges ( that were ) almost impassable and rivers ( that were ) often unfordable.
sentences.cn: 探险人员面临着几乎是无路可通的峡谷和常常是无法渡过的河流.

sentences.en: The mud made the roads impassable.
sentences.cn: 道路因为泥泞而无法通行.

sentences.en: The rise in the road is so high that it is impassable.
sentences.cn: 路上的壅土堆得太高,以致于堵住了道路.

sentences.en: Transaction costs can raise an impassable barrier to winning.
sentences.cn: 交易成本会成为取胜无法逾越的障碍.

sentences.en: We cannot remove our respective sections from each other, nor build an impassable wall between them.
sentences.cn: 我们不能把我们各区彼此搬迁, 也不能在他们中间建起无法逾越的长城.

sentences.en: When the road became impassable, we had to ditch the car and walk.
sentences.cn: 道路无法通行时, 我们只好弃车步行.

trans.tran_cn: 不能通行的，无法通过，不可逾越
trans.tran_en: a road, path, or area that is impassable is impossible to travel along or through
